Deep learning models need a lot of data and computing power. Training is often done on GPUs or TPUs. After training, the models can be used on smaller devices, sometimes with quantization to make them lighter.

Explain recursion like I am in high school.
Recursion is when a function calls itself to solve a smaller version of the same problem. You always define a simple base case where the function stops calling itself.
